name: Minimum Speed
description:
WASD / Arrow keys to move

Left click to use grappling hook

You can "wall jump" by sticking to a wall and press jump, totally not a feature based on a bug

Pro tip : Finish the levels as fast as possible before the minimum speed increases too high

This game is for Smol game jam (introduced by biraj, thx)

It lasts for 2 weeks but because of exams and procrastination I think I've only spent 5 days working on the game, hope this answers "why this game even exists"
